author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
#### PR description:

This is motivated by and replaces  PR #36103. 
There is no overlap-removal logic in this class, but rather a 3-object correlation condition, where correlations are done in pairs of two objects 
- First correlation condition between 
   - leg1 and leg2
- Second correlation condition between 
   - leg3 and leg1
   - leg3 and leg2

 Implementation of the logic motivated by PR #36103.

   Logic:
   - Define 3 GtConditionCategories: (1st & 2nd correlation legs with one correlation condition, and 3rd leg and its correlation condition with 1st and with 2nd leg )

   - Loop leg1: over all objects passing conditions of 1st correlation leg
     - Loop leg2: over all objects passing conditions of 2nd correlation leg
       - Check for dEta, dPhi, dR, and mass (and charge) correlation condition of 1st-leg and 2nd-leg object.
       - Loop over all objects of leg3 passing conditions of 3rd correlation leg
         - Check for dEta, dPhi, dR, correlation condition of 3rd leg with 1st and 2nd leg objects,each.
         - If correlation cuts NOT passing, save objects leg1, leg2, and leg3 object.
       - End loop leg3
     - End loop leg2
   - End loop leg1

#### PR validation:

Ran on Data and MC samples with Testing menu for Run3.
